Index.Title: Philippe St-Laurent-Recoura
Index.Main: Welcome to my portfolio! My name is Philippe St-Laurent-Recoura, and I am a computer developer. Passionate about new technologies and various areas of programming, I invite you to explore this site. Here, you can learn more about me, my background, my past projects, and my many skills. Enjoy your visit!
